name: Sorted Food
about:
Just a group of mates battling to become awesome home cooks.

From our studio in London, we’re joined by millions of passionate chefs and ‘normals’ around the world to explore, learn and have a laugh around food.

Each week we serve up three new videos for you to devour - catch them on Monday, Wednesday and Sunday at 5pm GMT.

Wanna chat about partnering with us? Drop us an email partnerships@sortedfood.com
